message.content:
The task is to identify and extract three specific values from the income statement:

1. Total income arising in the course of an entityâ€™s ordinary activities.
2. Carrying amount of inventories sold during the reporting period.
3. Costs of general management and administration of the entity as a whole.

Looking at the problem statement table:

| Account | Amount | Date |
| --- | --- | --- |
| Main Business Revenue | 4879769.51 | 2024-02-05 |
| Total Revenue | 4879769.51 | 2024-02-05 |
| Cost of Goods Sold | 2018000.00 | 2024-02-05 |
| Total Cost | 2018000.00 | 2024-02-05 |
| Gross Profit | 2861769.51 | 2024-02-05 |
| Administrative Expenses | 294758.34 | 2024-02-05 |
| Selling Expenses | 274260.07 | 2024-02-05 |
| Depreciation | 91505.05 | 2024-02-05 |
| Financial Expenses | 67135.35 | 2024-02-05 |
| Total Expenses | 727658.81 | 2024-02-05 |
| Interest Income | 13279.60 | 2024-02-05 |
| Profit Before Tax | 2147390.30 | 2024-02-05 |
| Tax Expense | 243988.48 | 2024-02-05 |
| Net Profit | 1903401.82 | 2024-02-05 |

Step 1: Total income arising in ordinary activities typically corresponds to Total Revenue or Main Business Revenue. Both have the same amount 4,879,769.51. According to the example, "value1" was the "Main Business Revenue" value.

Step 2: Carrying amount of inventories sold corresponds to the "Cost of Goods Sold", which is 2,018,000.00.

Step 3: Costs of general management and administration correspond to "Administrative Expenses" which is 294,758.34.

Following the original line item order as per the requirements:

- value1: Main Business Revenue: 4879769.51  
- value2: Cost of Goods Sold: 2018000.00  
- value3: Administrative Expenses: 294758.34

```json
{"solution": {"value1": "4879769.51", "value2": "2018000.00", "value3": "294758.34"} }
```
